column2: Your Retinue is a standing army consisting of §Y250-man§! regiments. Unlike Army Levies, retinues are always on the map and reinforce slowly. Retinues cost the most maintenance while reinforcing, but will still cost one fourth of their maximum reinforcement cost when simply being maintained.\nThe maximum number of retinue regiments you can field depends on your §YMilitary Organization§! technology, the size of all the levies in your realm, and the buildings in your demesne.
Immortals will never succumb to old age, but they can still die from other causes.

Judaism is, collectively, the religion of the Jewish people. It affirms the existence of one God, Yahweh, who entered into covenant with the descendants of Abraham, God's chosen people. Judaism's holy writings reveal how God has been present with them throughout their history. These writings are known as the Torah, specifically the five books of Moses, but most broadly conceived as the Hebrew Scriptures (traditionally called the Old Testament by Christians) and the compilation of oral tradition known as the Talmud (which includes the Mishnah, the oral law). It has no special features.
